For everyone who's having the pause problem, I found a way to fix it. I don't know if it'll work for you, but I swear it did for me:

Just play in campaign mode as the USSR, and it should unpause when you click the button. After you do that, exit to the main menu and start a new game. I've only played the USA campaign so far, but it works fine. You'll have to repeat the process every time you run the game, though.
